home.banner-title: 🚀 Your online community has been launched!
home.banner-content: Now it’s time for the exciting stuff! Learn how you can make the most impact with your groups using our engagement pro-tips.
home.empty-banner-title: Looks like you have no stats yet...
home.empty-banner-content: Once your groups are up and running, your ministry analytics will be displayed down below 👇
home.create-first-group-desc: Click the button below to create your first group 👇
home.video-guide-description: Learn how to user Carry's tools

group.share-your-plan: Share this video to your social media
group.click-below-to-download: Click below to download this video to your device
group.social-video-click: Click on a video to view and download
group.social-video-click-desc: Click on a video to view and  download it. This is a great way to promote your plan and invite others to join your group. ✨
group.send-invite-link-via-text: Send invite link to members via text
group.delete-warning-2: and all data associated with this group. Are you sure?
group.enter-group-leader: Enter group leader email or name
group.keep-typing-to-invite: Keep typing to invite via email
group.plan-banner-title: Schedule a plan for this group! 📝
group.plan-banner-content: Looks like this group needs a new plan to study... Click below to schedule a new plan for this group 👇

login.login-title: Enter your email, we’ll send you a login link
login.login-email-no-permission: This email address doesn’t have access to this app.
login.sending-login-link: We just sent a login link to
login.logging-out-dashboard: Logging you out, see you next time 👋 ...
login.sending-new-link: Click the button below to send a new login link to
login.please-provide-email-for-confirmation:
It looks like you're trying to login using a different browser 🕵️
Please re-enter your email address to log in.
login.login-failed: Failed to login! Something went wrong, please try again.
login.not-login-link: Your login link is not valid, logging out...
login.cant-confirm-email: Failed to confirm your email. Logging out...
login.link-existed-account: It looks like you've got an existing app account. To proceed click the button below to link your two accounts ✨
login.link-existed-account-failed: Sorry, we failed to link your account at the moment, please try again!

members.delete-warning-1: You are about to delete member
members.delete-warning-2: and all data associated with their account. Are you sure?
members.remove-dashboard-access-warning-1: You are about to remove dashboard access for
members.remove-dashboard-access-warning-2: (This will not delete their member account).
members.denied-remove-member: Please remove dashboard access for before deleting their account
members.name: Name
members.empty-banner-title: This is where your members will display!
members.empty-banner-content: Once your groups are up and running, you’ll be able to view  and export member details.✨

plans.sermon-video-generating: Your sermon video post is generating...
plans.sermon-video-generating-description: Your sermon video preview is still generating and will be available soon. Check back later to view it.
plans.amount-of-days-title: How many days will this study be?
plans.enter-title-of-day: Enter a title for the day
plans.enter-question: Enter question (ex. What stood out to you?)...
plans.add-activities-content: Click on a day to edit its title and add activities to it. We recommend keeping activities light on the weekend to accomodate busy schedules.
plans.add-day-activity-content: Select activities to add to this day. We typically recommend adding a passage, 1-2 questions, and a prayer or gratitude prompt every other day.
plans.upload-own-video-description: Film your own video and upload the file for your study
plans.use-youtube-video-description: Paste the video URL to the YouTube video you’d like to include
plans.choose-group-title: Which group(s) do you want to schedule this plan for?
plans.build-own-plan-description: Create a custom plan from scratch and add your own activities
plans.generate-from-sermon-description: Automatically create a plan from your sermon YouTube link
plans.share-plan-title: Would you like to share this plan?
plans.schedule-plan-message: ⏳ Scheduling this plan for your group...
plans.invalid-youtube-url: Please input a valid Youtube video url
plans.preview-templates-content: Click a plan to preview its content and details before you select it.
plans.template-banner-title: Click on a day to view its content 👇
plans.template-banner-desc: See what specific readings, questions, and activities are in each day. Click the button above if you’d like to select this template to use.
plans.share-with-mobile-desc: Group leaders can select this plan from the Carry app
plans.select-campus-title: 🔑 Which campus do you want to give access to this plan?
plans.empty-banner-content: Click the button below to create your first plan 👇

templates.empty-banner-title: This is where your templates will display!
templates.empty-banner-content: You can choose to publish plans as templates for others to use or edit when creating their own plans. 👌

featured.empty-banner-title: This is where your featured plans will display!
featured.empty-banner-content: You can choose to recommend plans to group leaders by publishing them as  featured plans. Group leaders will be able to access these in the app. 👍

plans.over-max-plan-days: Please enter in a plan length of 60 days or fewer
plans.schedule-plan-description: Assign this plan to a group by clicking the 'Schedule plan' button above

plan.schedule-plan-success: Schedule this plan to groups success
plan.user-a-org-plan-desc: Select a pre-made {{orgName}} plan to use as a template
plan.publish-template-desc: Everyone at {{orgName}} can use this plan as a template
plan.overlapped-future-plan-title: Your selected start date overlaps with a future study...
plan.overlapped-current-plan-title: Your selected start date overlaps with your current study...
plan.overlapped-future-plan: Would you like to replace that future study?
plan.overlapped-current-plan: Would you like to replace that current study?
plan.delete-warning-2: and all activities associated with this plan. Are you sure?
plan.plan-author-description: Enter plan author name or email

settings.content-banner-user: Review the list of churches and check the box next to each church you’d like this user to have dashboard access to.
settings.ministry-admin-desc: Access to all settings for all campuses
settings.campus-leader-desc: Able to manage groups within assigned campuses and invite campus users
settings.campus-user-desc: Able to manage groups only within assigned campuses
settings.access-to-all-campus-description: This user has admin access for all campuses within the organisation
settings.billing-desc: Click 'View billing' to adjust payment settings, view invoices, and more on Stripe, Carry's payment processing platform.

campuses.empty-banner-content: Click the button below to create a campus for your minsitry 👇

integrations.title-banner: ⚡ Connect Carry to your favorite apps
integrations.content-banner: Share all the fun data collected in Carry with your existing apps. Choose from the options below 👇
integrations.planning-center-desc: Sync up group info, member contact details and more directly into your Planning Center database
integrations.giving-stripe-desc: Activate Giving by connecting with Stripe, Carry’s payment processing platform.

error-server: An unexpected error has occurred, we've let someone know! 🛠️

errors.group-only-campus: Each group belongs to only one campus!
errors.group-only-leader: Each group can have only one Leader!

select-organisation-title: 🔑 Which organisation do you want to access?

giving.empty-banner-content: Click the button below to create a general ministry fund that your members can regularly give to.
giving.campaign-empty-banner-content: Click the button below to create a temporary giving campaign.
giving.add-campaign-media-desc: Increase the impact of your campaign by adding a video to give more context.
giving.name: Name
giving.suggested-gift-description: Members will be able to select from these suggested amounts or enter their own amount
giving.choose-campuses-description: Select all campuses you would like to participate in this giving campaign
giving.replace-confirm-model-title: This campus is already assigned to the
giving.replace-confirm-desc: Would you like to replace this fund?
giving.select-groups-title: Which groups do you want to publish this campaign for?
giving.publish-groups-description: Select specific groups you’d like to publish this campaign for
giving.publish-campuses-description: Select each campus you’d like to publish this campaign for

welcome-dashboard-description: Let’s kick things off by creating your first group
tour-created-group-description:
Now it’s a time to create your first Bible study plan. 
Don’t worry, we’ll walk you through the process! 👌
tour-invite-member-qr-title: 🎉 You did it! Now for the fun part...
tour-invite-member-qr-description: Your Carry group is ready for you to jump in! Scan the QR code and enter your group code to access it.
